maps/hideout/path-3.json/entities/100/se.orig: You don't know when to stop, do you?
maps/hideout/path-3.json/entities/100/se.text: Tu ne sais jamais quand t'arrêter, hein ?

maps/hideout/path-3.json/entities/113/se.orig: You can throw as many enemies at me as you like.
maps/hideout/path-3.json/entities/113/se.text: Vous pouvez me balancer autant d'ennemis que vous voulez.

maps/hideout/path-3.json/entities/113/se.orig: The level threshold doesn't exactly work in your favor.
maps/hideout/path-3.json/entities/113/se.text: La différence de niveau ne joue pas tellement en votre faveur.

maps/hideout/path-3.json/entities/417/se.orig: If you interrupt him, all of his hard work will be lost.\. Don't do this!
maps/hideout/path-3.json/entities/417/se.text: Si tu l'interromps maintenant, tout son travail sera perdu.\. Ne fais pas ça !

maps/hideout/path-3.json/entities/417/se.orig: So?\. It never should have happened in the first place!
maps/hideout/path-3.json/entities/417/se.text: Et alors ?\. De toute façon, ça n'aurait jamais dû arriver !

maps/hideout/path-3.json/entities/452/se.orig: So far this place seems entirely abandoned...
maps/hideout/path-3.json/entities/452/se.text: Pour l'instant cet endroit a l'air d'être entièrement abandonné...

maps/hideout/path-3.json/entities/452/se.orig: Please do not let this be a dead end...
maps/hideout/path-3.json/entities/452/se.text: J'espère que ce n'est pas une mauvaise piste...

maps/hideout/path-3.json/entities/454/se.orig: This spot is pretty nice, isn't it?
maps/hideout/path-3.json/entities/454/se.text: Ce coin est plutôt agréable, non ?
[acquiesce]

maps/hideout/path-3.json/entities/454/se.orig: Certainly better than anything you'd find in Vermillion Wasteland.
maps/hideout/path-3.json/entities/454/se.text: Certainement mieux que tout ce que tu peux trouver à \v[area.arid.name].

maps/hideout/path-3.json/entities/454/se.orig: Let's sit down for a bit.
maps/hideout/path-3.json/entities/454/se.text: Asseyons-nous un peu.

maps/hideout/path-3.json/entities/454/se.orig: So what words can you say exactly?
maps/hideout/path-3.json/entities/454/se.text: Donc quels sont les mots que tu peux dire exactement ?
Salut. Bye. Lea.
Comment. Pourquoi.
Attends. Désolée...
C'est tout ?
[acquiesce]
Ça doit être agaçant.
Et sinon... Tu portes toujours ces cornes.
Donc tu les détestes aussi ?
Elles sont nulles, hein ?
[acquiesce]

maps/hideout/path-3.json/entities/454/se.orig: That all happened because of a stupid joke.
maps/hideout/path-3.json/entities/454/se.text: Et tout ça, c'est à cause d'une blague idiote.

maps/hideout/path-3.json/entities/454/se.orig: I often complained that horns don't fit the Spheromancer design at all.
maps/hideout/path-3.json/entities/454/se.text: Je râlais souvent que les cornes n'allaient pas du tout avec le design des Spheromanceurs.

maps/hideout/path-3.json/entities/454/se.orig: So of course, one day Sergey gifted them to me.\. Very funny.
maps/hideout/path-3.json/entities/454/se.text: Donc bien sûr, un jour, Sergey me les a offertes.\. Ce petit malin.

maps/hideout/path-3.json/entities/454/se.orig: And then they'd always log into my account and equip them.
maps/hideout/path-3.json/entities/454/se.text: Et ensuite, ils se connectaient toujours à mon compte et me les équipaient.
Ces imbéciles.

maps/hideout/path-3.json/entities/454/se.orig: And now you ended up with them. Sorry for that.
maps/hideout/path-3.json/entities/454/se.text: Et maintenant c'est toi qui te retrouves avec. Désolée pour ça.
Pourquoiiiii....

maps/hideout/path-3.json/entities/454/se.orig: Don't ask me. I didn't do it.
maps/hideout/path-3.json/entities/454/se.text: Me demande pas, c'est pas moi qui l'ai fait.

maps/hideout/path-3.json/entities/454/se.orig: Well... at least they left you the scar.
maps/hideout/path-3.json/entities/454/se.text: Bon... au moins ils t'ont laissé la cicatrice.
Les cicatrices, ça déchire.
[acquiesce]

maps/hideout/path-3.json/entities/454/se.orig: Guess we both have the same taste. Makes sense.
maps/hideout/path-3.json/entities/454/se.text: Donc on a les mêmes goûts. C'est logique.

maps/hideout/path-3.json/entities/454/se.orig: But you're lucky, you know that?
maps/hideout/path-3.json/entities/454/se.text: Mais tu es chanceuse, tu sais ça ?
Tu as été épargnée du pire.

maps/hideout/path-3.json/entities/454/se.orig: You didn't have to witness your brother dying in front of you.
maps/hideout/path-3.json/entities/454/se.text: Tu n'as pas été obligé de voir ton frère mourir en face de toi.

maps/hideout/path-3.json/entities/454/se.orig: And the futility of the whole situation...
maps/hideout/path-3.json/entities/454/se.text: Et de voir à quel point tout cela était absurde...

maps/hideout/path-3.json/entities/454/se.orig: They just kept you in that room... all the time.
maps/hideout/path-3.json/entities/454/se.text: Pendant tout ce temps, Ils t'ont toujours gardé dans cette pièce...
... à s'occuper de toi...
... Désolée.
Tais-toi !
Ne sois pas désolée.

maps/hideout/path-3.json/entities/454/se.orig: Honestly, none of this is your fault.
maps/hideout/path-3.json/entities/454/se.text: Honnêtement, rien de tout cela n'est de ta faute.
Au final...\. Ce serait surtout à moi de m'excuser.

maps/hideout/path-3.json/entities/454/se.orig: For what I did to you...
maps/hideout/path-3.json/entities/454/se.text: Pour ce que je t'ai fait...

maps/hideout/path-3.json/entities/454/se.orig: This whole situation...\. it's been going on for so long already...
maps/hideout/path-3.json/entities/454/se.text: Cette situation...\. Elle dure depuis déjà trop longtemps...

maps/hideout/path-3.json/entities/454/se.orig: I just don't know what to do anymore...
maps/hideout/path-3.json/entities/454/se.text: Je sais plus ce que je dois faire...

maps/hideout/path-3.json/entities/454/se.orig: How much longer I can take this...
maps/hideout/path-3.json/entities/454/se.text: Combien de temps je vais pouvoir encore endurer ça...
Arrête ça...

maps/hideout/path-3.json/entities/454/se.orig: How can you be like this, after all the things I did to you?
maps/hideout/path-3.json/entities/454/se.text: Comment tu peux compatir comme ça, après tout ce que je t'ai fait ?
C'est trop tôt...
Pour être sentimentale comme ça...
Ça... ça ne me ressemble pas du tout...
Salut !

maps/hideout/path-3.json/entities/454/se.orig: Oh hey!\. Didn't expect to see you here.
maps/hideout/path-3.json/entities/454/se.text: Oh, hé !\. Je m'attendais pas à te voir ici.

maps/hideout/path-3.json/entities/454/se.orig: It's great that they allowed us to still get to this place.
maps/hideout/path-3.json/entities/454/se.text: C'est cool qu'ils nous permettent encore d'aller à cet endroit.
[acquiesce]

maps/hideout/path-3.json/entities/454/se.orig: Then again...\. this place is connected to a lot of bad memories, too.
maps/hideout/path-3.json/entities/454/se.text: Mais aussi...\. cet endroit me rappelle tellement tout un tas de mauvais souvenirs.

maps/hideout/path-3.json/entities/454/se.orig: Like...\. on that day you returned.
maps/hideout/path-3.json/entities/454/se.text: Comme...\. le jour où tu es revenue.

maps/hideout/path-3.json/entities/454/se.orig: Honestly...\. I was stupid.\. Acting like a child.
maps/hideout/path-3.json/entities/454/se.text: Honnêtement...\. J'étais stupide.\. Je me conduisais comme un enfant.

maps/hideout/path-3.json/entities/454/se.orig: It's still so embarrassing when I think about it...
maps/hideout/path-3.json/entities/454/se.text: C'est toujours aussi embarrassant quand j'y pense...
[secoue la tête]
Il te manque encore les bons mots ?
Laisse-moi deviner.

maps/hideout/path-3.json/entities/454/se.orig: It's "no problem", or "I understand" or something like that.
maps/hideout/path-3.json/entities/454/se.text: C'est "pas de problème", ou "je comprends", ou quelque chose du genre.
[acquiesce]
Bien-sûr...

maps/hideout/path-3.json/entities/454/se.orig: Honestly, though...\. I've been thinking back to that moment a lot recently...
maps/hideout/path-3.json/entities/454/se.text: Mais très honnêtement...\. J'y repense souvent ces derniers temps, à ce moment...
De notre duel...
Tu m'as bien torché le derrière.
maps/hideout/path-3.json/entities/454/se.note: is more like botter/tanner le cul

maps/hideout/path-3.json/entities/454/se.orig: I want a rematch!\. How about it?
maps/hideout/path-3.json/entities/454/se.text: Je veux une revanche.\. Qu'est-ce que t'en dis ?
[acquiesce]
Je t'ai complètement torché le derrière !
Tu veux une revanche ?
[acquiesce]
OK !

maps/hideout/path-3.json/entities/454/se.orig: I'll quickly go to the \c[3]arena\c[0] then and create a \c[3]custom cup\c[0].
maps/hideout/path-3.json/entities/454/se.text: Alors je vais rapidement faire un saut à l'\c[3]arène\c[0] et créer une \c[3]coupe personnalisée\c[0].

maps/hideout/path-3.json/entities/454/se.orig: You can challenge me there whenever you're ready.
maps/hideout/path-3.json/entities/454/se.text: Tu peux me lancer un défi là-bas quand tu veux, si tu es prête.

maps/hideout/path-3.json/entities/455/se.orig: Shizuka...
maps/hideout/path-3.json/entities/455/se.text: Shizuka...

maps/hideout/path-3.json/entities/455/se.orig: Hello again.
maps/hideout/path-3.json/entities/455/se.text: Rebonjour.

maps/hideout/path-3.json/entities/455/se.orig: Hi.
maps/hideout/path-3.json/entities/455/se.text: Salut.

maps/hideout/path-3.json/entities/455/se.orig: Still kicking, I see.
maps/hideout/path-3.json/entities/455/se.text: Toujours en forme, à ce que je vois.

maps/hideout/path-3.json/entities/455/se.orig: Did you just forget everything I told you?
maps/hideout/path-3.json/entities/455/se.text: Est-ce que tu as tout oublié ce que je t'ai dit ?

maps/hideout/path-3.json/entities/455/se.orig: [shakes head]
maps/hideout/path-3.json/entities/455/se.text: [secoue la tête]

maps/hideout/path-3.json/entities/455/se.orig: Oh...\. that's just wonderful!
maps/hideout/path-3.json/entities/455/se.text: Oh...\. mais c'est génial !

maps/hideout/path-3.json/entities/455/se.orig: So the bot is fully aware of itself and it doesn't even matter anymore!
maps/hideout/path-3.json/entities/455/se.text: Donc le robot est entièrement conscient d'elle-même et ça ne lui pose aucun problème !

maps/hideout/path-3.json/entities/455/se.orig: And then you simply escape your prison...
maps/hideout/path-3.json/entities/455/se.text: Et ensuite tu t'échappes simplement de ta prison...

maps/hideout/path-3.json/entities/455/se.orig: ...re-enter the Playground....
maps/hideout/path-3.json/entities/455/se.text: ... retourne sur le Terrain de jeu...

maps/hideout/path-3.json/entities/455/se.orig: ... just strolling around with my memories...
maps/hideout/path-3.json/entities/455/se.text: ... en te baladant tranquillement avec mes souvenirs...

maps/hideout/path-3.json/entities/455/se.orig: ... like they're yours to use freely.
maps/hideout/path-3.json/entities/455/se.text: ... comme s'ils étaient libres de t'appartenir.

maps/hideout/path-3.json/entities/455/se.orig: Can somebody PLEASE JUST DELETE YOU ALREADY?!
maps/hideout/path-3.json/entities/455/se.text: Est-ce que quelqu'un POURRAIT TE SUPPRIMER À LA FIN ?!

maps/hideout/path-3.json/entities/455/se.orig: Oh how I'd love to just rip your head off!
maps/hideout/path-3.json/entities/455/se.text: Oh comment j'adorerais pouvoir t'arracher la tête !

maps/hideout/path-3.json/entities/455/se.orig: But what does it even matter in this cursed simulation?!
maps/hideout/path-3.json/entities/455/se.text: Mais qu'est-ce que ça changerait dans cette foutue simulation ?!

maps/hideout/path-3.json/entities/455/se.orig: If I only knew the machine you're running on!
maps/hideout/path-3.json/entities/455/se.text: Si seulement je savais sur quelle machine tu tournes !

maps/hideout/path-3.json/entities/455/se.orig: I'd gladly crush those circuits myself!
maps/hideout/path-3.json/entities/455/se.text: J'écraserais bien ses circuits moi-même !

maps/hideout/path-3.json/entities/455/se.orig: ...Sorry?
maps/hideout/path-3.json/entities/455/se.text: ... Désolée ?

maps/hideout/path-3.json/entities/455/se.orig: Don't you dare just "sorry" me like that!
maps/hideout/path-3.json/entities/455/se.text: N'essaie pas de me sortir un pauvre "Désolée" comme ça !

maps/hideout/path-3.json/entities/455/se.orig: I know exactly why you are here.
maps/hideout/path-3.json/entities/455/se.text: Je sais exactement pourquoi tu es là.

maps/hideout/path-3.json/entities/455/se.orig: You plan to see him.
maps/hideout/path-3.json/entities/455/se.text: Tu es venue ici pour le voir.

maps/hideout/path-3.json/entities/455/se.orig: And I won't let you.
maps/hideout/path-3.json/entities/455/se.text: Et je ne te le permettrais pas.

maps/hideout/path-3.json/entities/455/se.orig: Why?
maps/hideout/path-3.json/entities/455/se.text: Pourquoi ?

maps/hideout/path-3.json/entities/455/se.orig: You have no right to see him. You have no right to exist...
maps/hideout/path-3.json/entities/455/se.text: Tu n'as aucun droit de le voir. Tu n'as aucun droit d'exister...

maps/hideout/path-3.json/entities/455/se.orig: All you should do is disappear!
maps/hideout/path-3.json/entities/455/se.text: Tout ce que tu devrais faire, c'est disparaitre !

maps/hideout/path-3.json/entities/455/se.orig: But since you won't do that...
maps/hideout/path-3.json/entities/455/se.text: Mais vu que ce n'est pas ce que tu comptes faire...

maps/hideout/path-3.json/entities/455/se.orig: I will fight you.\. Right here.\. Right now.
maps/hideout/path-3.json/entities/455/se.text: Je vais te combattre.\. Ici.\. Maintenant.

maps/hideout/path-3.json/entities/455/se.orig: As long as it takes you... to give up!
maps/hideout/path-3.json/entities/455/se.text: Aussi longtemps qu'il le faudra pour... que tu abandonnes !

maps/hideout/path-3.json/entities/456/se.text: QUOI ?!\. C'ÉTAIT QUOI ÇA ?!
C'était un échauffement.

maps/hideout/path-3.json/entities/456/se.orig: WHY DO YOU DO SO MUCH DAMAGE?!\. YOU'RE EVEN MORE \c[1]FAKE\c[0] THAN I EXPECTED!!
maps/hideout/path-3.json/entities/456/se.text: POURQUOI TU FAIS AUTANT DE DÉGÂTS ?!\. TU ES ENCORE PLUS \c[1]FACTICE\c[0] QUE CE QUE JE PENSAIS !!

maps/hideout/path-3.json/entities/456/se.orig: Don't let it get to your head. I was just testing you.
maps/hideout/path-3.json/entities/456/se.text: Ne te fais pas d'illusion. Je te testais, juste.
Bon sang, ça rime à rien ! C'est complètement \c[1]délirant\c[0] !!
\c[1]Bye bye~\c[0]

maps/hideout/path-3.json/entities/456/se.orig: WHATEVER!\. I'll just keep fighting you, no matter how fast you defeat me!!
maps/hideout/path-3.json/entities/456/se.text: PAS GRAVE !\. Je m'en fiche de la vitesse à laquelle tu me bats !!

maps/hideout/path-3.json/entities/456/se.orig: So is that all the revolutionary AI is capable of!?
maps/hideout/path-3.json/entities/456/se.text: Donc c'est tout ce que l'IA révolutionnaire sait faire ?
Pathétique !
Révolutionnaire mes fesses !

maps/hideout/path-3.json/entities/456/se.orig: Seriously, is that all you're capable of?
maps/hideout/path-3.json/entities/456/se.text: Sérieusement, c'est tout ce dont tu es capable ?
Sois maudite !!
Qu'est-ce que tu cherches à prouver, au juste ?

maps/hideout/path-3.json/entities/456/se.orig: Why do you keep going, you stupid program?!
maps/hideout/path-3.json/entities/456/se.text: Pourquoi tu continues, espèce de programme stupide !
Laisse-nous tranquille à la fin !

maps/hideout/path-3.json/entities/456/se.orig: Just playing around in CrossWorlds while we're stuck here!
maps/hideout/path-3.json/entities/456/se.text: Toi tu t'amuses dans CrossWorlds pendant que nous on reste coincé ici !

maps/hideout/path-3.json/entities/456/se.orig: Have at least the decency to stay out of this!
maps/hideout/path-3.json/entities/456/se.text: Aie au moins la décence de rester en dehors de tout ça !

maps/hideout/path-3.json/entities/456/se.orig: I don't care for you! Nobody cares for you!
maps/hideout/path-3.json/entities/456/se.text: Je m'en fiche de toi ! Tout le monde s'en fiche de toi ! Personne ne t'aime !
Mais va-t'en !
Laisse-nous tranquille à la fin !

maps/hideout/path-3.json/entities/456/se.orig: I can keep going as long as necessary!!
maps/hideout/path-3.json/entities/456/se.text: Je peux continuer pendant la journée entière !!

maps/hideout/path-3.json/entities/597/se.text: Je continuerais à te combattre \c[1]toute la vie\c[0] s'il le faut !
Toi et tes \c[1]SATANÉS DÉGÂTS BIDOUILLÉS\c[0] !! Sans ça, tu n'es RIEN !!

maps/hideout/path-3.json/entities/597/se.orig: Just because you won doesn't mean I'll let you proceed!
maps/hideout/path-3.json/entities/597/se.text: Ce n'est pas parce que tu as gagné, que je vais te laisser passer !

maps/hideout/path-3.json/entities/597/se.orig: You don't look like you're going to leave though.
maps/hideout/path-3.json/entities/597/se.text: Tu ne sembles pas vouloir renoncer pour autant.
Prépare-toi à prendre une autre raclée !

maps/hideout/path-3.json/entities/781/se.orig: This whole area is just so terribly delimited...\. no way to move around.
maps/hideout/path-3.json/entities/781/se.text: Cet endroit est vraiment trop confiné...\. Pas moyen de se balader.

maps/hideout/path-3.json/entities/781/se.orig: Still, there is a little spot at the lake over there.
maps/hideout/path-3.json/entities/781/se.text: Au moins, il y a un coin sympa sur le lac là-bas.

maps/hideout/path-3.json/entities/788/se.orig: Phew... that was a lot to take in, correct?
maps/hideout/path-3.json/entities/788/se.text: Pfiou... Ça fait vraiment beaucoup d'information à la fois, non ?
Bon...\. qu'est-ce que l'on fait ensuite ?

maps/hideout/path-3.json/entities/788/se.orig: Oh, right! We should head back to the \c[3]east of Sapphire Ridge\c[0].
maps/hideout/path-3.json/entities/788/se.text: Ah, oui ! Il faut qu'on retourne à \c[3]l'est de la \v[area.forest.name]\c[0].

maps/hideout/path-3.json/entities/788/se.orig: Specifically, to that \c[3]Old Dojo\c[0] where you got the Meteor Shade.
maps/hideout/path-3.json/entities/788/se.text: Plus précisément, à cet \c[3]Ancien Dojo\c[0], où tu as eu le Symbole de la Météorite.

maps/hideout/path-3.json/entities/788/se.orig: According to Satoshi, an entrance to Evotarground is hidden in that area.
maps/hideout/path-3.json/entities/788/se.text: D'après Satoshi, une entrée secrète vers le Terrain des Évotars est cachée là.

maps/hideout/path-3.json/entities/788/se.orig: I would like to have a look at it.
maps/hideout/path-3.json/entities/788/se.text: J'aimerais bien y jeter un œil.

maps/hideout/path-3.json/entities/788/se.orig: You can use that teleporter for a quick connection to the \c[3]dojo\c[0].
maps/hideout/path-3.json/entities/788/se.text: Tu peux utiliser ce téléporteur, il te mènera directement au \c[3]dojo\c[0].

maps/hideout/path-3.json/entities/790/se.orig: Uhm...\. Lea?\. Should we log out now?
maps/hideout/path-3.json/entities/790/se.text: Hum...\. Lea ?\. Est-ce qu'il faut se déconnecter maintenant ?

maps/hideout/path-3.json/entities/790/se.orig: ...Wait.
maps/hideout/path-3.json/entities/790/se.text: ... Attends.

maps/hideout/path-3.json/entities/790/se.orig: You seem to like this place...
maps/hideout/path-3.json/entities/790/se.text: On dirait que tu aimes cet endroit.

maps/hideout/path-3.json/entities/790/se.orig: [nods]
maps/hideout/path-3.json/entities/790/se.text: [acquiesce]

maps/hideout/path-3.json/entities/790/se.orig: Well...
maps/hideout/path-3.json/entities/790/se.text: Bien...

maps/hideout/path-3.json/entities/790/se.orig: Are you nervous?
maps/hideout/path-3.json/entities/790/se.text: Tu es anxieuse ?

maps/hideout/path-3.json/entities/790/se.orig: [nods]
maps/hideout/path-3.json/entities/790/se.text: [acquiesce]

maps/hideout/path-3.json/entities/790/se.orig: Same for me, really.
maps/hideout/path-3.json/entities/790/se.text: C'est pareil pour moi, en fait.

maps/hideout/path-3.json/entities/790/se.orig: This plan is very risky... there are so many things that could potentially go wrong.
maps/hideout/path-3.json/entities/790/se.text: Ce plan est très risqué... il y a tellement de choses qui peuvent potentiellement mal tourner.

maps/hideout/path-3.json/entities/790/se.orig: ...Why?
maps/hideout/path-3.json/entities/790/se.text: ... Pourquoi ?

maps/hideout/path-3.json/entities/790/se.orig: Uhm...\. sorry.\. Building confidence is not exactly my strong suit.
maps/hideout/path-3.json/entities/790/se.text: Euh...\. désolé.\. Je suis pas très fort pour remonter le moral des gens.

maps/hideout/path-3.json/entities/790/se.orig: By now you probably already guessed it, but I plan to involve the other First Scholar members.
maps/hideout/path-3.json/entities/790/se.text: Tu l'as probablement déjà deviné, mais j'ai prévu d'impliquer les autres membres des Premiers Érudits.

maps/hideout/path-3.json/entities/790/se.orig: We will need their help to properly execute the plan.
maps/hideout/path-3.json/entities/790/se.text: On aura besoin de leur aide pour mener le plan à bien.

maps/hideout/path-3.json/entities/790/se.orig: That also means I have to explain the full situation to them...\. and tell them about you.
maps/hideout/path-3.json/entities/790/se.text: Cela veut aussi dire que je dois tout leur expliquer...\. et leur dire qui tu es.

maps/hideout/path-3.json/entities/790/se.orig: I understand that you are nervous about this, but there really is no way around it.
maps/hideout/path-3.json/entities/790/se.text: Je sais que tu es anxieuse à propos de cela, mais il n'y a vraiment pas d'autres solutions.

maps/hideout/path-3.json/entities/790/se.orig: [nods]
maps/hideout/path-3.json/entities/790/se.text: [acquiesce]

maps/hideout/path-3.json/entities/790/se.orig: And... I am pretty positive they will understand.
maps/hideout/path-3.json/entities/790/se.text: Et... Je suis sûr qu'ils comprendront.

maps/hideout/path-3.json/entities/790/se.orig: Trust me on that, you are no stranger to them anymore.
maps/hideout/path-3.json/entities/790/se.text: Fais-moi confiance là-dessus, tu n'es plus une inconnue pour eux.

maps/hideout/path-3.json/entities/790/se.orig: Also...\. here is something I should have said a long time ago...
maps/hideout/path-3.json/entities/790/se.text: Sinon...\. Il y a quelque chose que j'aurais dû te dire il y a longtemps...

maps/hideout/path-3.json/entities/790/se.orig: \c[3]Thank you, Lea\c[0].
maps/hideout/path-3.json/entities/790/se.text: \c[3]Merci beaucoup, Lea\c[0].

maps/hideout/path-3.json/entities/790/se.orig: We had such a long journey together...
maps/hideout/path-3.json/entities/790/se.text: On a vécu tant de choses ensemble...

maps/hideout/path-3.json/entities/790/se.orig: You went through such a number of hardships... and you always kept going.
maps/hideout/path-3.json/entities/790/se.text: Tu as dû subir tellement d'épreuves difficiles... et tu n'as jamais abandonné.

maps/hideout/path-3.json/entities/790/se.orig: Really, I could not have imagined a better partner.
maps/hideout/path-3.json/entities/790/se.text: Vraiment, je n'aurais pas pu imaginer une meilleure partenaire.

maps/hideout/path-3.json/entities/790/se.orig: ...Lea?
maps/hideout/path-3.json/entities/790/se.text: ... Lea ?

maps/hideout/path-3.json/entities/790/se.orig: So what about now? Ready to logout?
maps/hideout/path-3.json/entities/790/se.text: Et maintenant ? Tu veux te déconnecter ?

maps/hideout/path-3.json/entities/790/se.orig: [nods]
maps/hideout/path-3.json/entities/790/se.text: [acquiesce]

maps/hideout/path-3.json/entities/790/se.orig: Bye.
maps/hideout/path-3.json/entities/790/se.text: Bye.

maps/hideout/path-3.json/entities/790/se.orig: Good night, Lea.
maps/hideout/path-3.json/entities/790/se.text: Bonne nuit, Lea.

maps/hideout/path-3.json/entities/790/se.orig: Logout
maps/hideout/path-3.json/entities/790/se.text: Déconnexion

maps/hideout/path-3.json/entities/791/se.text: Est-ce que tu as bien dormi ?

maps/hideout/path-3.json/entities/791/se.orig: Well then, time to get everyone together!
maps/hideout/path-3.json/entities/791/se.text: Bien, alors il est temps de réunir tout le monde !
Je suis heureux que tu l'aies demandé !

maps/hideout/path-3.json/entities/791/se.orig: I worked really hard and managed to add a couple more words to your vocabulary!
maps/hideout/path-3.json/entities/791/se.text: J'ai travaillé vraiment dur pour réussir à ajouter quelques mots à ton vocabulaire !

maps/hideout/path-3.json/entities/791/se.orig: I am sure that will help getting everyone together, correct?
maps/hideout/path-3.json/entities/791/se.text: Je suis sûr que ça va aider à rassembler tout le monde, non ?

maps/hideout/path-3.json/entities/791/se.orig: Well then, let us call the others.
maps/hideout/path-3.json/entities/791/se.text: Eh bien, allons appeler les autres.

maps/hideout/path-3.json/entities/791/se.orig: The goal is to get everyone to assemble in the \c[3]meeting room\c[0] at the \c[3]First Scholar HQ\c[0].
maps/hideout/path-3.json/entities/791/se.text: Le but est de faire réunir tout le monde dans la \c[3]salle de réunion\c[0] au \c[3]QG des Premiers Érudits\c[0].

maps/hideout/path-3.json/entities/791/se.orig: Let us move there first, shall we?

maps/hideout/path-3.json/entities/799/se.orig: Oh my, what a lovely hideout!
Japp.\. Certainly beats our small headquarters.
maps/hideout/path-3.json/entities/799/se.text: Japp.\. C'est certainement mieux que notre petit quartier général.

maps/hideout/path-3.json/entities/799/se.orig: Well...\. we had the connections after all.
maps/hideout/path-3.json/entities/799/se.text: Oui bon...\. On avait les bonnes relations après tout.

maps/hideout/path-3.json/entities/799/se.orig: I am not sure what else there is to say other than...
maps/hideout/path-3.json/entities/799/se.text: Je ne sais pas quoi dire d'autre que...

maps/hideout/path-3.json/entities/799/se.orig: Thank you very much for everything.
We could not have done it without your help.
maps/hideout/path-3.json/entities/799/se.text: On aurait pas pu réussir sans votre aide.
Oh, vraiment, Ce n'était pas nécessaire !

maps/hideout/path-3.json/entities/799/se.orig: We served Justice where Justice was due!
maps/hideout/path-3.json/entities/799/se.text: On a servi la Justice lorsque cela était nécessaire !

maps/hideout/path-3.json/entities/799/se.orig: Sergey...\. Lea will be back, right?
maps/hideout/path-3.json/entities/799/se.text: Sergey...\. Lea va revenir, pas vrai ?

maps/hideout/path-3.json/entities/799/se.orig: Please promise me she will return...
maps/hideout/path-3.json/entities/799/se.text: S'il te plaît, promets-moi qu'elle va revenir...

maps/hideout/path-3.json/entities/799/se.orig: I... unfortunately cannot give you that promise.
maps/hideout/path-3.json/entities/799/se.text: Je... ne peux malheureusement pas te donner ma promesse.

maps/hideout/path-3.json/entities/799/se.orig: I can only promise that I will try my very hardest to make that happen.
maps/hideout/path-3.json/entities/799/se.text: Je peux seulement promettre que je vais faire tout mon possible pour y arriver.

maps/hideout/path-3.json/entities/799/se.orig: I'm gonna miss you so much...
You have to return someday... It has to happen....
maps/hideout/path-3.json/entities/799/se.text: Il faut que tu reviennes un jour... Il le faut...

maps/hideout/path-3.json/entities/799/se.orig: Ha!\. Finally I can witness that infamous hug!
maps/hideout/path-3.json/entities/799/se.text: Ha !\. Enfin je peux voir ce fameux câlin !

maps/hideout/path-3.json/entities/799/se.orig: And let us hope we will meet again.
maps/hideout/path-3.json/entities/799/se.text: Et espérons que l'on se reverra un jour.

maps/hideout/path-3.json/entities/799/se.orig: Seriously...\. just how touchy can you even get?
maps/hideout/path-3.json/entities/799/se.text: Sérieusement...\. comment tu peux être aussi sentimentale ?

maps/hideout/path-3.json/entities/799/se.orig: Good night and sweet dreams, Lea.
maps/hideout/path-3.json/entities/799/se.text: Bonne nuit et fait de beau rêves, Lea.

maps/hideout/path-3.json/entities/799/se.orig:
Now it is up to me.\.
To make sure we can meet again.
maps/hideout/path-3.json/entities/799/se.text:
Maintenant c'est à mon tour.\.
De faire en sorte que l'on puisse se revoir.

maps/hideout/path-3.json/entities/800/se.orig: Ready to start the stress test?
maps/hideout/path-3.json/entities/800/se.text: Prête pour commencer le test de charge ?
